sentences.text: WashPost Hypes Intense Pressure From Gun Lobby For Gun Control Failure, Gives Obama A Pass By Jeffrey Meyer | April 18, 2013 | 11:10 AM EDT 0 shares The Washington Post seems to have joined President Obama in blaming the National Rifle Association for the Senate defeating recent gun control legislation.
